name: Urgent Rx Critical Care To-Go Pain Reliever Lemon-Lime Powders, 10 count

reviews.name: Urgent Rx Critical Care To-Go Pain Reliever Lemon-Lime Powders, 10 count
reviews.reviewText: Fit in your wallet. Keep in the sun visor in your car! Quick headache relief at your fingertips, and they taste good too. No chalky aspirin where you need water to swallow. I have these on hand all the time.
reviews.title: Convenient!

reviews.name: Urgent Rx Critical Care To-Go Pain Reliever Lemon-Lime Powders, 10 count
reviews.reviewText: I bought a few different kinds of Urgent RX before a long road trip and I was very thankful in the long run. Not only are they small and easy to store in the glove box but they taste good and work fast. I recently took a road trip and of course out in the middle of nowhere I get a really bad headache. There's nowhere to stop and it's late at night but that didn't matter because I was prepared! Thanks Urgent RX!
reviews.title: Roadtrip lifesaver!

reviews.name: Urgent Rx Critical Care To-Go Pain Reliever Lemon-Lime Powders, 10 count
reviews.reviewText: I have a few of these at work because when I feel like a headache is about to start I take these and then it is gone.
reviews.title: Awesome

reviews.name: Urgent Rx Critical Care To-Go Pain Reliever Lemon-Lime Powders, 10 count
reviews.reviewText: You plan your day, your vacation, but nobody plans on having a heart attack. Better to be prepared than not. Aspirin helps save lives when heart attacks strike. UrgentRx Critical Care Aspirin to-go packets fit anywhere so you take them everywhere. They don't require water and are easy to take. Its a smart choice. I carry them in my car, purse, pocket and I just feel better knowing that by doing so I might help save my life or the life of a loved one, friend or stranger. Its just better to be prepared.
reviews.title: It is better to be prepared!

reviews.name: Urgent Rx Critical Care To-Go Pain Reliever Lemon-Lime Powders, 10 count
reviews.reviewText: This is such an awesome product!!! I would throw this in my bag and tote it off to work so I could instantly get headache relief! Aspirin is my go-to pain relief choice and this just makes it so simple!
reviews.title: So simple!
